ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... private CR chamber in his suite was very quick and precise, but not taking any chances he went to a mirror and checked his face. It was perfect, flawless,

Date: Sun, 7 May 2000 12:42:42 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

::: With a snap-hiss the CR chamber doors open and HELL BEAST steps out. The 
private CR chamber in his suite was very quick and precise, but not taking 
any chances he went to a mirror and checked his face. It was perfect, 
flawless, and handsome....for a Predacon. He placed his gun in its holster 
and went to the bridge, :::

::: He entered to discover PHENIOX, GREMLIN, JACKLE, and BLACK ARACNIA busy 
on the computers and there tasks. But, RAT TRAP was also amoung them....:::

::; HELL BEAST, his portly body in the command chair ::: Why is that rat in 
our base?

::: GREMLIN ::: If it wasnt for him, MEGATRON would have destroyed the 
Auto-bots. I think we can trust him, now.

::: HELL BEAST ::: I find that very doubtful. Place him in a secure Brig 
until I decide what to do with him. Its bad enough Quickstrike is playing 
havoc with our systems...

::: RAT TRAP ::: HELL BEAST, I can help you get Quickstrike out. I know-

::: HELL BEAST places a hand up ::: Silence. INFERNO, take him to the Brig at 
once!

::: He draws his attention to the small diagnostic drone floating above him 
in the command chair :::

::: MEGATRON, with a disguised voice ::: Sir, there are still some Predacon's 
that have not returned from battle. But I do not detect any major damages 
coming from them.

::: HELL BEAST ::: Excellent. What else?

::: MEGATRON ::: Um, an aracnid wants to have a word with you. I belive he is 
a clone of some kind.

::: HELL BEAST ::: What dose that damn spider want?

::: TRANSANULAS chuckles from behinde HELL BEAST ::: Hahaha! HELL BEAST, you 
speak so spiteful of me?

::: HELL BEAST ::: Your a cheat and a liar, what do you want before I kill 
you?

:: TRANSANULAS :: Let me rejoin you, once agian. 

::: HELL BEAST ::: Fat chance. Predacons, open fire!

::: TRANSANULAS ::: No, wait! I can help you, please, let me join you!

::: GREMLIN interrupts ::: Sir, I think we should give him a seconed 
chance...he will serve us, or he can die.

::: HELL BEAST ::: Very well Gremlin, hes your response ability.

::: TRANSANULAS smiles and tots off to communicate with Quickstrike. It was 
only a matter of time before they took control of the ship agian. :::
